name: Christmas Mansion (Free)
description:
Play awesome puzzle levels, collect Santa's coins and prepare your house for Christmas with beautiful ornaments and illuminations. This winter’s tale will lead you to fantastic locations where you can relax and listen to holiday music while solving puzzles.

FEATURES:
- Incredible bonuses
- Fantastic gameplay
- Prepare your house for Santa!

Want to continue with this game while on the go? Get iPhone and iPad versions of this game!
iPad: http://itunes.apple.com/app/id582416071
iPhone/iPod touch: http://itunes.apple.com/app/id483875798
